8.58.text: Morden Hall Park is just a really nice place for the local community to come and enjoy being outdoors.

14.22.text:
See different wildlife from the herrings
to kingfishers

17.30.text: but it's really nice to see a little oasis in London for the people and for the wildlife

25.70.text: Volunteers help with everything that we do and their a really vital part of us running the park

30.02.text: and making it a special place for everyone.

43.90.text:
I started when I had retired and I
wanted something worthwhile to do,

49.60.text: I wanted something that would help keep me fit and get outdoors.

53.68.text: So I went for a volunteer gardener here.

57.20.text: A lot of our time here is spent pruning roses,

62.60.text: and edging the beds and all that kind of thing.

65.22.text: The other really nice thing is that there's a nice group of people

68.16.text: that you work with, that are friendly and really nice.

79.58.text: I like being outside, I like gardening, I love the rose garden.

83.88.text: But I enjoy this too, the vegetable garden. It's good to see food growing

87.62.text: and I think it's good for the children to come and see it.

90.24.text: They just think it comes in packets.

97.42.text: It's good for me to get out and it's a lovely place.

109.08.text: I work in the living green exhibition centre.

112.08.text: Most of the time I spend welcoming people,

115.73.text: I explain to them what the purpose of the exhibition is

120.51.text: and helping people to utilize all this information about

127.55.text: People do go away feeling that they've enjoyed being in the exhibition.

132.85.text:
you've made a difference to someone's
day even if in a small way.

145.09.text: I like being outside, I like gardening, I like the physical work.

148.51.text: This looks like an attractive thing to do.

151.40.text: You meet a nice group of people as well and get a lot of enjoyment satisfaction out of it.

157.40.text: I've been a member of the National Trust for many years and I've enjoyed visiting the properties.

162.26.text: I've always found when I go around properties I was worried about how much work was needed to upkeep

167.52.text: and it's nice to be able to contribute back as a volunteer

172.22.text: Our vision for the park is to be the park at the heart of the community

175.36.text: and we really need the community to help us.

177.60.text: We really couldn't run the park without them,

179.56.text: they give us about 11,000 hours of time each year

182.85.text: and they really are the heart of what we do.
